Shadow of the Colossus
You spend the whole game performing incredible feats of bravery in order to bring your girlfriend back to life like a true hero, only to realise that throughout the game, all you've been doing was helping to release an evil demon into the world. Then the good guys turn up and stop you, turning you into some demon baby, so that you cant even spend time with the girlfriend you just brought back to life.
Oh, and your horse falls off a cliff. Yep, onions at that part
